content.content: Start a centralized discussion to sort out how we call ERC category EIPs
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is initiating a discussion to clarify the naming convention for ERC category EIPs and is seeking feedback from the community. A 3rd party can provide constructive criticism on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: I continue to be a proponent referring to ERC EIPs as ERC-X. Also I would rather centralize the discussion on an PR to EIP-1.

There is a PR with discussion on this topic:  github.com/ethereum/EIPs         Reference ERCs by ERC-X   ethereum:master ← Pandapip1:reference-by-erc            opened 09:19PM - 15 Jul 22 UTC               Pandapip1             +1 -1       Changes EIP-1 to force ERCs to be referenced as `ERC-X` instead of `EIP-X`.  N…OTE: I honestly don't actually care if this change is implemented (in fact, I lean slightly towards keeping ERC references as `EIP-X`). I am just making this PR so that the appropriate action can be taken immediately once a consensus is reached.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
